snippet: Jet-set snowbirds, unite: It’s that time again, the week that promises to occupy Miami with steroidal event planning, loco brand collaborations and a bona fide smorgasbord of art. It’s Art Basel Miami Beach.
abstract: Jet-set snowbirds, unite: It’s that time again, the week that promises to occupy Miami with steroidal event planning, loco brand collaborations and a bona fide smorgasbord of art. It’s Art Basel Miami Beach.
lead_paragraph: Jet-set snowbirds, unite: It’s that time again, the week that promises to occupy Miami with steroidal event planning, loco brand collaborations and a bona fide smorgasbord of art. It’s Art Basel Miami Beach.

headline.main: Memo From Miami: What to Do at the Fair
